description: Various stats about the game for advanced players.

game.description: Contains data about the game overall.
game.title: Game Data

players.description: Each player's advanced stats over the whole game.  If the player's location is unknown, the value for that player will be null.

anyOf.description: Contains player-specific stats over the whole game.
anyOf.title: Player Stats

session.description: Defines aspects of the session or game being played.
session.title: Session

version.description: a version string matching x.x.x where x represents one or more digits
version.title: Version

title: Stats
